snippet: Even though Steve Berkowitz, chief of the real estate Web site Move Inc., has been on a plane that was struck by lightning, he reminds himself that flying is safer than driving.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Move Inc chief Steve Berkowitz discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Even though Steve Berkowitz, chief of the real estate Web site Move Inc., has been on a plane that was struck by lightning, he reminds himself that flying is safer than driving.

headline.main: Unlucky on Planes, but It’s All Part of the Commute
headline.print_headline: Unlucky on Planes, but It’s All Part of the Commute
